summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganHOURGLASS Equilibrium Instant Plumping Eye Mask instantly hydrates and plumps skin while reducing the look of puffiness and undereye bags for a more refreshed, wide-awake appearance.
details: DetailsBenefitsInstantly hydrates and plumpsInstantly reduces the look of puffiness and undereye bags.Smooths and visibly firms undereye areaReduces the look of fine lines and wrinklesImproves skin texture for a more refreshed appearanceInstantly helps you look more awakeProvides a radiant, healthy-looking glow Non-comedogenicVegan and cruelty-freeKey IngredientsHOURGLASS Amino Youth Lipids: Accelerates natural cell turnover and replenishes moisture with restoring lipids for radiant, youthful-looking skinPlumping Complex: Lightweight emollients instantly plump and smooth the appearance of undereye linesFormulated WithoutAlcoholGlutenMineral OilParabensPhthalatesPetrolatum/paraffinSulfatesSynthetic dyeSynthetic fragranceItem 2623378How To UseOn clean, dry skin, gently apply a thin layer to undereye area using fingertips. Leave on for at least 15 minutes, then either gently tissue off without rinsing or massage excess into skin until fully absorbed. Can be used alone or before makeup for an instant plumping effect and refreshing boost of hydration.IngredientsGlycerin, Water/Aqua, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Phenoxyethanol, Phospholipids, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Tocopherol, Lecithin.*Ingredient lists and claims may change or vary from time to time as part of HOURGLASS's commitment to innovation and maintaining global compliance. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product packaging you receive to ensure the ingredients are suitable for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: On clean, dry skin, gently apply a thin layer to undereye area using fingertips. Leave on for at least 15 minutes, then either gently tissue off without rinsing or massage excess into skin until fully absorbed. Can be used alone or before makeup for an instant plumping effect and refreshing boost of hydration.
ingredients: Lecithin.*Ingredient lists and claims may change or vary from time to time as part of HOURGLASS's commitment to innovation and maintaining global compliance. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product packaging you receive to ensure the ingredients are suitable for your personal use

reviews.headline: I have a spare so that I don't run out!
reviews.comments: This is the most moisturizing eye product I have ever used! I apply and leave on.  Used regularly, it plumps up the undereye area and erases lines!

reviews.headline: Love it for day or night
reviews.comments: Great under makeup, great after eye retinols

reviews.headline: I will not the product
reviews.comments: Do not buy this product you will be wasting your money it does not work at all.
